text:
Is there a way to restore an inherited field’s connection after it has been overridden?
> [if a field] gets directly overridden at the page level or in theme settings, its connection to the controlling field gets severed
is there a way to disable the new HubSpot themes? I don’t see them in my design manager and we don’t want them listed as a page template option.
Have i missed something, or is there no way to use the “styling” tab for custom modules?

There currently isn’t, but we’re exploring some ways to revamp how the style tab works in general so that it’s available across default and custom modules and it’s more customizable. I’ll definitely plan on updating in this channel with more info as I have it!
What! so glad to hear y’all are looking into this
Yep! I mean, disclaimer is that it’s a _big_ project so I may not have a ton of updates any time soon and I can’t guarantee anything, but I’m also super excited about it!
Can you access theme settings in modules?
